resources.string: Tap anywhere on the lower half of the widget to toggle between useful information such as hourly forecasts, current conditions, and your 5 day forecast.
Tap anywhere on the upper half of the widget to refresh it. The widget can be set to automatically update through the settings.
Tap the gear icon in the upper right corner of the widget to change various settings such as your location, unit types, and icons.
Thanks for choosing our widget! Let us know if there\'s anything you\'d like to see added in upcoming releases through the PlayStore.
Here\'s a quick tip to get you started, try tapping anywhere on the widget to change views.
Press next for some quick tips!
